article_title: Rural docs want looser rules for Hepatitis C treatment
article_text:
Greensburg, IN (47240)

Today

Considerable cloudiness. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High around 85F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 67F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: Maureen Hayden CNHI State Reporter

og.description: INDIANAPOLIS – The only doctor at the center of an HIV outbreak in rural Indiana cannot prescribe the latest treatments for patients also infected with the deadly Hepatitis C virus.
